name: Where is the End of Space
name_original: Where is the End of Space
description:
This is a reupload of a game I made for Newground's Deception Jam in June 2015. I've learned a lot about Construct 2 since then (see my other Construct 2 game, Colmeircia, for that), but I've chosen to upload this game as-is, with no edits after the fact.

__________

The title is a question. Is there an answer?

Made for the Construct 2 Deception Jam. Take control of the Corporal as you search for the end of space for Hauteur, Inc, in a galaxy of 21 planet types! All your equipment is of working order and this one-of-a-kind mission is completely safe. We promise!

Got something to say? Comment below, tweet me @NaomiNorbez, or go here for alternative contact links: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTi1ZD1yxRIrsF2EK...

__________

All art, music, voice-acting, & programming was done by me, Norbez-- except the space background, which was created by Haze (@TheStorysinger), but modified for this game, and used with permission. Some voice clips were modified as well. If you want to know more about the Isaiah 5 passage, I made a video a few years ago about the beginning of it:

Thank you for playing. I look forward to your thoughts.
